resources.string:
১.চুরি করার প্রয়োজন নেই বলে কারা চুরি করেনা? 
 উত্তর: সাধুরা

২.উদ্দিপকের শফিক ‘অপরিচিতা’ গল্পের কোন চরিত্রের প্রতিনিধি

উত্তর: হরিশ 

৩.কোন কারণে উদ্দিপকের আদিব ও ‘অপরিচিতা’ গল্পের অনুপম সাদৃশ্যপূর্ণ? 

উত্তর: (গ) ii ও iii ৪.”গ্রামের ছেলে গ্রামে বাস করবে।”______ ‘আহ্বান’ গল্পের এই বাক্যে প্রকাশ পেয়েছে গ্রামের প্রতি/উপর____ 

উত্তর: (গ) ভালোবাসা

৫.’মহাজাগতিক কিউরেটর’ গল্পে প্রাণের শুরু হয়েছে কোনটি থেকে?
 উত্তর: (ঘ) ভাইরাস

৬.”স্বচক্ষে দেখেছ রক্ষঃশ্রেষ্ঠ, পরাক্রম দাসের!”_______ 
 নিজেকে দাস বলার পিছনে মেঘনাদের কোন মনোভাবটি ক্রিয়াশীল?

উত্তর: (গ) অহমিকা
 ৭.’লোক লোকান্তর’ কবিতায় “আহত কবির গান”______ পঙক্তিটিতে কবি আহত কেন?

উত্তর: (গ) স্বপ্ন ও বাস্তবতার টানাপোড়নে

৮.আমার পথ প্রবন্ধ ও উদ্দিপকে উল্লিখিত কোন অভিন্ন কারণে শম্ভু মামুনের বাড়িতে যাওয়া থেকে বিরত থাকে?

উত্তর: (ক) ধর্মীয় গোঁড়ামি
 ৯.উদ্দিপকের শম্ভুর সাথে ‘আমার পথ’ প্রবন্ধের লেখকের স্বাতন্ত্র্য কীসে?
 উত্তর: (গ) সংস্কৃতিতে

১০.কোন নদীর কাজল বুকে পালিতে গলিত হেম?

উত্তর: (গ) সুরমা
 ১১.চাবুকের বাড়ির দিকে নুরুল হুদার আর মনোযোগ দেওয়া হয়ে ওঠেনা কেন?

উত্তর: (গ) মুক্তিযুদ্ধাদের সম্পর্কে গভীর ভাবনায়

১২.উদ্দীপকের মুন্না ‘তাহারেই পড়ে মনে’ কবিতার কোন চরিত্রের কথা মনে করিয়ে দেয়?

উত্তর: (ক) কবি
 ১৩.উদ্দীপকে ও ‘তাহারেই পড়ে মনে’ কবিতায় যুগপৎভাবে ফুঠে উঠেছে____

উত্তর: (ঘ) i,iiও iii

১৪.”কেন এই পন্ডশ্রম, মগজে হানিছ শূল।” ______ কবি কেন এমন উক্তি করেছেন?
 উত্তর: (খ) বিভিন্ন ধর্মগ্রন্থ মুখস্থ করায়

১৫.সিরাজউদ্দৌলা প্রজাসাধারণের কাছে নিজেকে অপরাধী মনে করার অন্তর্নিহিত কারণ, তিনি____

উত্তর: (ক) প্রজাদের সুখ-স্বাচ্ছন্দ্যের বিধান করতে পারে নি

১৬.’ঐকতান’ কবিতার কবি অক্ষয় উৎসাহে কী পড়েন?

উত্তর: (গ) ভ্রমণবৃত্তান্ত

১৭.’লালসালু’ উপন্যাসে কোচবিদ্ধ হয়ে নিহত হয় কে?

উত্তর: (গ) ছমিরুদ্দিন

১৮.’আঠারো বছর বয়স’ কবিতায় উল্লিখিত আঠারো বছর বয়সের কোন বৈশিষ্ট্যটি উদ্দিপকে ফুটে উঠেছে?

উত্তর: (ক) আত্মপ্রত্যয়

১৯.নিচের কোন চরণে উক্ত বৈশিষ্ট্যটি প্রকাশ পেয়েছে?
 উত্তর: (ঘ) এ বয়সে তাই নেই কোন সংশয়
 ২০.নুসরত শাহের আশরাফপুর শিলালিপি কোন হরফে লেখা?
 উত্তর: (গ) তুঘরা

২১.মোতাহের হোসেন চৌধুরী বৃক্ষের জীবনে কোন দুটি জিনিস উপলব্ধি করার পক্ষপাতী?

উত্তর: (ঘ) স্থৈর্য ও নীরবতা
 ২২.উদ্দীপকের সৌদামিনীর স্বামীর মধ্যে “লালসালু” উপন্যাসের কোন চরিত্রের মানসিকতা বিদ্যমান?

উত্তর: (গ) মজিদের

২৩.উদ্দীপকে এবং লালসালু উপন্যাসে আমাদের সমাজের কোন অসঙ্গতি বিদ্যমান?

উত্তর: (খ) বহুবিবাহ

২৪.”দারোগাবাবু এসে বসে আছেন বাবুর সাথে ।” ‘মাসিপিসি’ গল্পের এ বাক্যে প্রকাশ পায়____

উত্তর: (গ) iiও iii
 ২৫.’বায়ান্নর দিনগুলো’ রচনার কথকের সত্তায় কী লক্ষ্য করা যায়?

উত্তর: (ক) দৃঢ়চেতা মনোভাব
 ২৬.’ফ্রেবুয়ারী ১৯৬৯’ কবিতার লক্ষনীয় বিষয়___

উত্তর: (ঘ) i,iiও iii

২৭.’এই পৃথিবীতে এক স্থানে আছে’ কবিতায় ধানের গন্ধের মতো অস্ফুট কে?

উত্তর: (গ) লক্ষ্মীপেঁচা
 ২৮.উদ্দীপকের কালামের সাথে ‘সিরাজউদ্দৌলা’ নাটকের কোন চরিত্রকে তুলনা করা যায়?

উত্তর: (গ) সাঁফ্রে
 ২৯.এরূপ তুলনার কারণ, উভয়েই____

উত্তর: (ঘ) i,iiও iii

৩০.’সেই অস্ত্র’ কবিতায় কবির কাঙ্ক্ষিত অস্ত্র উত্তোলিত হলে কী খাঁ খাঁ করবে না?

উত্তর: (খ) গৃহস্থালি

201. Which of these classes are used by character streams output operations ?
 a) ReadStream
 b) Writer 
 c) InputStream 
 d) InputOutputStream

 Correct : b) Writer


202. How to store heavy structured data in android ?
 a) Shared Preferences
 b) Cursor 
 c) SQlite database
 d) Not possible

 Correct : c) SQlite database


203. What are the wake locks available in android ?
 a) PARTIAL_WAKE_LOCK
 b) SCREEN_DIM_WAKE_LOCK
 c) SCREEN_BRIGHT_WAKE_LOCK 
 d) FULL_WAKE_LOCK

 Correct : d) FULL_WAKE_LOCK


204. What are the functionalities in asyncTask in android ?
 a) onPostExecution()
 b) onProgressUpdate()
 c) onPreExecution() 
d) doInBackground()

 Correct : a) onPostExecution() Note: [All are correct ]

 205. Fragment in Android can be found through
 a) findByID() b) findFragmentByID() c) findFragmentByName()
 d) FragmentManager.findFragmentByID()

 Correct : d) FragmentManager.findFragmentByID()

 206. Is it possible activity without UI in android ?

 a) No, its not possible 
b) Yes, its possible 
c) We ca not say 
d) None of the above
 Correct : b) Yes, its possible 


303. What is An Intent in android
 a) a view objectt
 b) a messaging object 
 c) A and B 
 d) None of them

 Correct : b) a messaging object


304. What is An Activity
 a) An Activity represents a multiple screens in an app
 b) An Activity represents a single screen in an app
 c) An Activity represents exactly two screens in an app d) All of them


Correct : b) An Activity represents a single screen in an app


305. Whan is A Service
 a) A Service is a component that performs operations in the background without a user interface.
 b) A Service is a component that performs operations in the background with a user interface.
 c) A Service is a component that performs operations in the foreground without a user interface.
 d) A Service is a component that performs operations in the foreground with a user interface.
 Correct : a) A Service is a component that performs operations in the background without a user interface.


306. How many types of Intent are
 a) 3 
 b) 4 
 c) 5
 d) 2

 Correct : d) 2


307. Which of the followings are intent
 a) Explicit intents
 b) Modern intents
 c) Implicit intents 
 d) Call intents

 Correct : a) A and C


308. What is the name of the activity allows itself to be started by a web browser to display data referenced by a link, such as an image or an e-mail message.


a) CATEGORY_BROWSABLE 
 b) CATEGORY_LAUNCHER 
 c) CATEGORY_BROWSE
 d) All of them


Correct :a) CATEGORY_BROWSABLE


309. What if Flags in Intent

 a) Metadat for an intent
 b) Metadat for an Bundle 
 c) All of them 
 d) one of them


Correct : b) Metadat for an intent


311. What is the function of ACTION_MAIN
 a) to indicates main entry point and does not expect any intent data
 b) to indicates main entry point and expects any intent data
 c) to indicates any entry point and expects any intent data
 d) to indicates any entry point and does not expect any intent data


Correct : a) to indicates main entry point and does not expect any intent data


312. How to create a Intent launching the Browser From Your Android Applications
 a) Intent launchBrowser = Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, uriUrl);
 b) Intent launchBrowser = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, uriUrl);
 c) Intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, uriUrl);
 d) All of them

 Correct : b) Intent launchBrowser = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, uriUrl);


313. Which of the following is done to enable Web Searches
 a) Intent search = Intent(Intent.ACTION_WEB_SEARCH);
 b) Intent search = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_WEB_SEARCH);
 c) search = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_WEB_SEARCH); d) None of them

 Correct : b) Intent search = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_WEB_SEARCH);


314. What is the function of Layout
 a) to defines the structure for a user interface in your app
 b) to defines the structure for an intent in your app
 c) to defines the structure for a storyboard in your app
 d) None of them
 Correct : a) to defines the structure for a user interface in your app


315. Which objects are responsible to build all elements in a layout
 a) View and ViewGroup
 b) View and Scene
 c) View and Intent
 d) ViewGroup and scene
 Correct : a) View and ViewGroup


316. a ViewGroup is
 a) visible container
 b) All of them 
 c) an invisible container
 d) None of them
 Correct : c) an invisible container


317. The syntax for an ID, inside an XML tag is:
 a) android:id="+id/my_button" 
 b) android:id="@+id/my_button"
 c) android:id="id/my_button"
 d) All of them
 Correct : b) android:id="@+id/my_button"


318. What is the name of the APIs used to play audio and video files
 a) CDPLayer APIs 
 b) Player APIs 
 c) AudioVideo APIs 
 d) MediaPlayer APIs
 Correct : d) MediaPlayer APIs


319. What is retrofit android ?
 a) type safe REST Client 
 b) Type safe client 
 c) Client 
 d) Session
 Correct : a) type safe REST Client


320. What is the aim of Retrofit?
 a) consume all services
 b) consume restful services 
 c) consume web services d) none
 Correct : b) consume restful services


321. What is by default being leaveraged by Retrofit 2?
 a) Http 
 b) Https 
 ) OkHttp 
 d) SMTP
 Correct : c) OKHttp


322. In which, OkHttp works as a networking layer?
 a) RetroFit
 b) Retro 
 c) Retrofit 1
 d)Retrofit 2
 Correct : d)Retrofit 2


323. What is Volley?
 a) Http Library 
 b) Https Library 
 ) SMTP library 
 d) retrofit library
 Correct : a) Http Library


324. What is the advantage of volley in android?
 a) Graphics 
 b) Networking 
 c) File Transfer
 d) Image
 Correct : b) Networking


325. Which service is not offered by Volley?
 a) Auto Scheduling
 b) Multiple Connections
 c) Debugging and tracing
 d) Auto Ordering
 Correct : d) Auto Ordering


326. Which service is offered by Volley?
 a) Transparent Scheduling
 b) Multiple Cancellation
 c) Debugging and tracing
 d. Auto Ordering
 Correct : c) Debugging and tracing


327. UI is populated by Volley using __ fill the gap
 a) RPC type operations
 b) PPC type operations 
 c) API type operations 
 d) both a and b
\ Corerct : a) RPC type operations


328. How a page of search is fetched by Volley ?
 a) Structured array 
 b) String data
 c) Structured Data
 d) none
 Correct : c) Structured Data


329. Which uses HTTP as an underlying protocol ?
 a) World Wide Wan 
 b) World Wide Wap
 c) World Wide Web
 d) Email
 Correct : c) World Wide Web


330. Which are methods of HTTP ?
 a) POST and RETURN 
 b) POST and GET
 c) GET and RETURN
 d) RETURN
 Correct : b) POST and GET


331. Which method of HTTP requests data?
 a) POST b) GET c) RETURN d) None
 Correct : b) GET
 332. Which method of HTTP submits data ?
 a) POST b) GET c) RETURN d) None
 Correct : a) POST

 333. Which method of HttpURLConnection obtain a new HttpURLConnection ?
 a) POST b) URL.openConnection c) URL.connection d) GET
 Correct : b) URL.openConnection
 334. What are included in URI. Request headers metadata ?
 a) credentials b) preferred content type c) session cookies d) all of three
 Correct : d) all of three

 335. With which, instances of URLConnection class must be initialized if they contain a request body ?
 a) setDoOutput(true) 
b) setDoInput(true) 
c) setOutput(true) 
d) setInput(true)
 Correct : a) setDoOutput(true)

 336. Which method returns the stream which is used by URLConnection class for output ?
 a) getOutput b) getInputStream c) getOutputStream d) getInput
 Correct : c) getOutputStream 337. Which is not imcluded in response headers metadata ?
 a) Response Body Content b) Response Body Type c) response body Length
 d. Response Body History
 Correct : d) Response Body History

 338. Which are included in response headers metadata?
 a) Response Body Content b) Response Body Type c) response body Length d) all of three

 Correct : d) all of three

 339. What is returned by getInputStream if response has no body ?
 a) ouput Stream b) empty stream c) input stream d) null
 Correct : b) empty stream

 340. Which method closes the HTTPURLConnection ?
 a) disclose b) close c) disconnect d) disrupt
 Correct : c) disconnect

 341. How many redirects HttpURLConnection will follow up to?
 a) 5 b) 6 c) 3 d) 4
 Correct : a) 5

 342. Which method configures the connection for uploading data to a web server ?
 a) setOutput b) setUpload c) setDoUpload d) setDoOutput
 Correct : d) setDoOutput

 343. When body length of data is known, which method should be called when uploading data ?
 a) setFixedLengthMode b) setFixedStreamingMode c) setFixedLengthStreamingMode
 d) setFixedMode
 Correct : c) setFixedLengthStreamingMode

 344. When body length of data is not known, which method should be called when uploading data?
 a) setChunkedLengthMode b) setStreamingMode
 c) setChunkedStreamingMode d) setChunkedMode
 Correct : c) setChunkedStreamingMode

 345. InputStream and OutputStream returned by HttpURLConnnection class are __?
 a) buffered b) serialized c) unbuffered d) unserialized
 Correct : c) unbuffered

 346. What HttpURLConnection class should do for reducing latency?
 a) use same socket for maultiple request b) use same socket for multiple response
 c) borh a and b d) none
 Correct : c) borh a and b

 347. HTTP connections may be held __ longer than necessary.
 a) closed b) open c) partially open d) partially closed
 Correct : b) open
 348. What the disconnect method of HTTP connection might return ?

 a) socket b) JSON array c) Unicode Character array d) NSMUtableString
 Correct : a) socket
 349. What type of compression is requested by the HttpURLConnection to the servers?
 a) gasip b) zip c) rar d) gzip
 Correct : d) gzip
 350. Which method of HttpURLConnection is used for data decompression?
 a) getInputStream b) getOutputStream c) getInput d) None
 Correct : a) getInputStream

 351. How Gzip compression can be disabled ?
 a) acceptable encodings in header b) acceptable stream c) special encodings at header d) none
 Correct : a) acceptable encodings in header

 352. What getInputStream returns when the string is exhausted?
 a) 0 b) -1 c) 3 d) 1
 Correct : b) -1

 353. Which method returns the number of bytes transferred?
 a) getLength b) length c) contentLength d) getContentLength
 Correct : b) UIImage

 354. Which method tests connection redirection?
 a) getURL b) getHttp c) URI d) getURI
 Correct : a) getURL

 355. Which method triggers the receiving of response headers ?
 a) getHeaderFields b) getInputStream c) both a and b d) none
 Correct : c) both a and b

 356. Which class includes all extensible cookie manager ?
 a) HttpURL b) HttpURLConnection c) HttpHeader d) none
 Correct : b) HttpURLConnection

 357. Where the default cookie manager keeps all the accepted cookies?
 a) server b) file c) cache d) memory
 Correct : d) memory

 358. What the cookies must have set to be included in headers?
 a) domain properties b) path properties c) server properties d) both a and b
 Correct : d) both a and b
 359. What is the cookie version should be set for compatibility with most servers?
 a) 11 b) 0 c) 1 d) -1
 Correct : b) 0
 360. Which method is used by HttpURLConnection by default?
 a) GET b) POST c) RETURN d) None
 Correct : a) GET
 361. Which method causes the HttpURLConnection to use POST method ?
 a) setDO b) setOutput c) setDoOutput d) set
 Correct : c) setDoOutput
 362. Which method is used to use a proxy?
 a) URL.openConnection(Proxy) b) URL.Connection(Proxy) c) URL.open(Proxy)
 d) URL.(Proxy)
 Correct : a) URL.openConnection(Proxy)
 363. Which version of android includes a response cache?
 a) Android 1 b) Android 2 c) Android 4 d) Android 3.2
 Correct : c) Android 4
 364. With what type of servers, new instances of cookies work?
 a) that support RFC 2965 cookies b) that support RFC 2695 cookies
 c) that support RFC 2665 cookies d) both a and b
 Correct : a) that support RFC 2965 cookies
 365. What should be Implemented to define a custom cookie store?
 a) store b) cookieServer c) cookieDepot d) CookieStore
 Correct : d) CookieStore

 363. Which one is a HTTP method?
 a) GET b) DELETE c) TRACE d) all of three
 Correct : d) all of three

 364. Which one is not a HTTP method?
 a) HEAD b) DELETE c) TRACE d) TAIL
 Correct : d) TAIL

 365. In array handling of JSON streams which method should be called first?
 a) beginArray b) startArray c) readArray d) array
 Correct : a) beginArray

 366. In array handling of JSON streams which method should be called to read the closing bracket ?
 a) endArray() b) finishArray() c) end() d) Array
 Correct : a) endArray()

 367. In object handling of JSON streams which method should be called first ?
 a) begin b) startObject c) beginObject d) object
 Correct : c) beginObject
 368. In object handling of JSON streams which method should be called to read the closing bracket?
 a) end() b) finishObject c) endObj() d) endObject()
 Correct : d) endObject()
 369. Which method is common in both array handling and object handling of JSON streams ?
 a) beginArray b) beginObject c) endObject d) hasNext
 Correct : d) hasNext

 370. When an unknown name is encountered, what strict parsers should do?
 a) Continue b) Fail c) Pass d) None
 Correct : b) Fail
 371. Which method checks if a value is null ?
 a) peek b) nullFinder c) read d) hasNext
 Correct : a) peek
 372. Which method consumes null literals ?
 a) nextPeek b) peek c) nextNull d) none
 Correct : c) nextNull
 373. Which method sorks alike nextNull ?
 a) getNull b) skipValue c) nextValue d) getNext
 Correct : b) skipValue
 374. How JSON reader reads numeric values ?
 a) usual way b) as string c) both a and b d) as structure

 Correct : c) both a and b

 375. In which way , JSON reader permits to read string values ?
 a) as numbers b) as array c) as structure d) none
 Correct : a) as numbers
 376. Which method works to read next element from JSON array ?
 a) nextInt b) nextString c) both a and b d) none
 Correct : c) both a and b
 377. To minimize loss, how large numeric values should be written in JSON ?
 a) as string b) as array c) as it is d) none
 Correct : a) as string
 378. To maintain precision, how large numeric values should be read in JSON?
 a) as string b) as array c) as structure d) as ponter
 Correct : a) as string
 379. How many JSON streams a JSON reader should read ?
 a) double stream b) single JSON stream c) mixed data stream d) null stream
 Correct : b) single JSON stream
 380. JSON reader is __. Fill the gap
 a) thread vulnurable b) thread safe c) not threadsafe d) risky
 Correct : c) not threadsafe
 381. Which one helps us to perform background tasks without altering threads ?
 a) resyncTask b) threadTask c) syncTask d) AsyncTask
 Correct : d) AsyncTask
 382. Which method is invoked on Uithread before any task is executed ?
 a) onPreExecute() b) onExecute() c) onReExecute() d) onPriExecute()
 Correct : a) onPreExecute()
 383. How many kinds of parameters are there for Async Task ?
 a) 2 b) 3 c) 4 d) 5
 Correct : b) 3
 384. What is the "Params" parameter type of Async Task ?
 a) array b) integer c) string d) structure
 Correct : c) string
 385. What is the "Progress" parameter type of Async Task ?
 a) array b) integer c) string d) void
 Correct : d) void
 386. What is the "Result" parameter type of Async Task ?
 a) Bitmap b) HashMap c) String d) Void
 Correct : a) Bitmap
 387. Which method downloads content in Async Task ?
 a) onProgressUpdate() b) publishProgress() c) doInBackground() d) Progress()
 Correct : c) doInBackground()
 388. Which method updates the percent progress in Async Task ?
 a) onProgressUpdate() b) publishProgress() c) doInBackground() d) Progress()
 Correct : a) onProgressUpdate()

 389. Which method computes the total number of bytes in Async Task ?
 a) onProgressUpdate() b) publishProgress() c) doInBackground() d) Progress()

 Correct : c) doInBackground()

 390. Who is responsible for handling messages and runables ?
 a) thread b) handler c) compiler d) operating system
 Correct : b) handler

 391. What the "@Path" annotation in retrofit denotes for ?
 a) variable substitution for the API endpoint b) variable path for the API endpoint
 c) variable for the API endpoint d) path substitution for the API endpoint
 Correct : a) variable substitution for the API endpoint

 392. What the "@Query" annotation in retrofit denotes for ?
 a) specifies the query key name b) specifies the query name
 c) specifies the key name d) specifies the name
 Correct : a) specifies the query key name
 393. What the "@Body" annotation in retrofit denotes for ?
 a) payload for call b) payload for the GET call
 c) payload for the POST call d) payload for the POST
 Correct : c) payload for the POST call

 394. Headers can be added to a request using an Interceptor
 a) Inceptor b) Interruptor c) Interpretor d) Interceptor
 Correct : d) Interceptor

 395. Which of the following is not an extra field in android email ?
 a) EXTRA_TITLE b) EXTRA_TEXT c) EXTRA_SUBJECT d) EXTRA_BODY
 Correct : d) EXTRA_BODY

 396. What is SQLite ?
 a) It is an automatically integrated with cloud service
 b) It is a temporary file and then replacing the current document
 c) It is an in-process which is a Zero configured, self-contained and serverless
 d) It is a library that implements a lightweight embedded relational Database
 Correct : c) It is an in-process which is a Zero configured, self-contained and serverless
 397. What is the meaning of Self Contained ?
 a) Self Dependencies b) External dependcies 
 c) Self motivation d) No external dependencies
 Correct : d) No external dependencies
 398. What is SQLite transaction ?
 a) UNIX process b) ACID compliant c) LINUX process d) None
 Correct : b) ACID compliant

 399. SQLite is written in
 a) C++ b) JAVA c) ANSI C d) PHP
 Correct : c) ANSI C

 400. What does mean of DDL ?
 a) Data Decline Language b) Data Distribution Language
 c) Data Transfer of Distributing Language d) Data Definition Language
 Correct : d) Data Definition Language

 401. What is the command of DDL ?
 a) INSERT b) ALTER c) SELECT d) None
 Correct : b) ALTER

 402. What is SQLiteManager ?
 a) a database manager for SQLite database b) a database manager for SQL
 c) It is control the all documents of database d) No one
 Correct : a) a database manager for SQLite database

 403. What does the mean Of DQL ?
 a) Data Query Language b) Data Qualification Language
 c) Data Manipulate Language d) none
 Correct : a) Data Query Language

 404. What is the command for DQL ?
 a) UPDATE b) DELETE c) VIEW d) SELECT
 Correct : d) SELECT

 405. Which of the following command is “DROP” ?
 a) DQL b) DDL c) DML d)none
 Correct : b) DDL

 406. Which of the following meaning is DML?
 a) Data Manipulate Language b) Data Manipulation Language
 c) Data Device Manipulation Language d) Data Magnification language
 Correct : b) Data Manipulation Language

408. " Choose the correct option according to the given option.
 Statement 1: A content provider behaves very much like a database — you can query it, edit its content, as well as add or delete content.
 Statement 2: Content providers let you centralize content in one place and have many different applications access it as needed.
 Statement 3: A content provider does not provide the facility to centralize content. "
 a) Option 1 is correct. b) Option 2 is correct.
 c) Option 1and 2 is correct. d) Option 2 and 3 is correct
 Correct : c) Option 1and 2 is correct.
 409. Which of the following is the meaning of “CRUD” ?
 a) create, retrieve, update, and drop 
 b) create, retrieve, update, and delete
 c) create, return, unite, and delete d)none
 Correct : b) create, retrieve, update, and delete

 410. " If you want to share the data from one application to other applications, which of the following you will use? "v a) SQLiteDatabases b) Internal Storage 
c) Content Provider d) None of the above
 Correct : c) Content Provider

 411. To share data across packages in Android which one you will prefer ?
 a) Shared Preference b) Content Provider c) Data provider d) None of the above
 Correct : b) Content Provider

 412. Identifies data in a provider-
 a) Content provider b) Data Provider c) Content URI d) Shared Preference
 Correct : c) Content URI

 413. Which of the following statement is True ?
 a) TheContentResolver can then dispatch the query arguments to the correct provider
 b) The ContentProvider uses the path part of the content URI to choose the table to access.
 c) a and b is true d) none
 Correct : c) a and b is true
 414. For Creating your own content provider which class you will prefer ?
 a) Conten b) Content Provider c) Object d) None of the above
 Correct : b) Content Provider
 415. How many frequency of Applet ?
 a) 220 b) 225 c) 250 d) 255
 Correct : b) 225
 416. What is the uses of cursor loader ?
 a) A callback interface you must implement b) The base class for all loaders
 c) An implementation that uses an AsyncTask to do its work
 d) A subclass of AsyncTask Loader for accessing ContentProvider Data
 Correct : d) A subclass of AsyncTask Loader for accessing ContentProvider Data

 417. What is/are storage option available in android ?
 a) SharedPreference b) SQLiteDatabase 
c) ContentProvider d) All of the above
 Correct : d) All of the above
 418. What is Loader?
 a) Loading data a content provider or other data 
source for display in an FragmentActivity or Fragment b) Changing and encapsulating a value
 c) Converting a group of related object that can be stored and transferred d) None of the above
 Correct : a) Loading data a content provider or other data source for display in an FragmentActivity or Fragment

 419. Why does loader run on separate thread ?
 a) To prevent from a dangerous software b) To prevent janky or unresponsive UI
 c) Option b is false d) Option a is true
 Correct : b) To prevent janky or unresponsive UI

 420. How does the Loaders simplify a thread management ?
 a) By providing receiver methods when event occur
 b) By providing callback methods when event occur
 c) By providing calling process when event occur d) All of the above
 Correct : b) By providing callback methods when event occur

 421. What does we do to prevent duplicate queries ?
 a) Loaders persist a callback method 
 b) Loaders persist to prevent janky or unresponsive UI
 c) Loaders persist and cache result across configuration changes 
 d) Which of the following
 Correct : b) Loaders persist to prevent janky or unresponsive UI

 422. Which of the following statement is true ?
 a) Loading data a content provider or other data source for display in an FragmentActivity or Fragment
 b) Loaders can implement an observer to mon
 c) Option 1 is false b) Option 2 is false
 Correct : a) Loading data a content provider or other data source for display in an FragmentActivity or Fragment

 423. Characteristics of the Loaders ?
 a) They are available to every Activity and Fragment
 b) They provide asynchronous loading of data
 c) They monitor the source of their data and deliver new result when the content changes
 d) All of the above
 Correct : d) All of the above

 424. What is cloud storage ?
 a) A powerful, simple and cost-effective object storage service built for Google scale.
 b) It is a monitor which is the source of their data a nd deliver the content changes
 c) Provides a useful storage buffer which that c ontains of a file may be read and write
 d) None of the mentioned
 Correct : a) A powerful, simple and cost-effective object storage service built for Google scale.

 425. What to use Google security to file uploads and downloads for your Firebase apps ?

 Correct : b) Firebase SDKs

 426. What will you use to store images, audio, video, or other user-generated content ?

 427. What will use to access the same files on the server ?

 Correct : c) Software Development kit
 429. The Firebase Real-time database is a-
 a) SDK b) Cloud storage c) Cloud hosted database d) b and c
 Correct : c) Cloud hosted database

 430. What is Fairbase Real-time database?
 a) A powerful , simple and cost –effective object storage service built for Google scale
 b) A content provider or other data source for display in an Fragment Activity or fragment
 c) Is synced across all clients in realtime and remains available when your app goes offline
 d) Is synced across all clients in realtime and remains available when your app goes offline and online
 Correct : c) Is synced across all clients in rea ltime and remains available when your app goes offline

 431. How we can store firebase ?
 a) DDL b) SSD c) SDK d) JSON
 Correct : d) JSON

 Correct : a) Flexible

 435. Firebase Authentication provides-

 b) An implementation that uses an Asynctask to do its work

 Correct : a) Backend services, easy to use SDKs and readymade UI liberies to authenticate

 d) is a cross –platform messaging solution that lets you reliably deliver messages at no cost
 Correct : d) is a cross –platform messaging solution that lets you reliably deliver messages at no cost

 439. What is Google Analytics for Firebase ?

 b) Is a trusted environment such as Cloud Functions 
 for Firebase or an app server on which to build, target, and send messages.

 Correct : a) Is a free app measurement solution that
 provides insight on app usage and user engagement

 440. Which of the following statement is true ?
 a) At the heart of Firebase is Google Analytics for Firebase, a free and unlimited analytics solution.
 b) The Loader API lets you load data from a content provider or other data source for display in an FragmentActivity or Fragment.
 c) Data is synced across all clients in realtime, and remains available when your app goes offline.
 d) All of the above
 Correct : a) At the heart of Firebase is Google Analytics for Firebase,
 a free and unlimited analytics solution

 482. What is Encapsulation ?
 a) Everything inside an unit b) Inherit all criteria from parent
 c) Take any relevant form d) None of the above
 Correct : a) Everything inside an unit

 483. What is abstraction ?
 a) Everything inside an unit b) Inherit all criteria from parent
